name: Argillite
description: Eyy, i found cool argillite rock while i was at beach! How rare are these? Im really curious!

name: Basalt crushing
description: Im in a process of making my all-rock experiment, and for that, i need dusts of... a lot of rocks. I had no problem with crushing sedimentary rocks like chalk or sandstone, but basalt is a troublemaker. Anybody knows, how to crush it at home?

name: Home Copper: Chapter 3
description: Chapter 3 of my home made copper adventure! Today, i finally found beatiful chunk of copper after a week of ordering ore and filtering it. On image is chunk of around 1-2kg i found, but there are a lot of not pretty ones.

name: Strange rock?
description: Hey! While i was exploring some caves, i found this strange rock. I assumed that this is andesite, but it appears that it is not. Anybody has any idea what is this?

name: Limonite question
description: I bought this big sample of limonite from shop that is near my street. Homever, im not very sure that this is Limonite and not random brick, how can i check?

name: What is this?
description: Hello, during exploration of my cellar, i found this crystal! Can somebody help me identify what crystal is this? I am really curious! My grandma loved collecting various gems and crystals, so this is not the first one i found. Homever, i canâ€™t seem to understand which one is that, it seems like some corundum, but i am not sure...

name: How to process iron?
description: So, i found this huge piece of Siderite while i was looking for some more gems for my collection. Personally, im not a fan of processing ore, but because i have wonderful possibility for it, i am curious, whether i can get some high purity iron from it. If anybody has recommendations on how to clear, purify or effectively break into smaller chunks, please answer!
